meanings.sent1: The bouncer excludes people who are not on the guest list from entering the club.
meanings.sent2: Please exclude any unauthorized users from accessing the confidential files.
meanings.sent3: The gatekeeper jokingly excludes anyone wearing a silly hat from entering the castle.
meanings.sent4: His strict diet excludes all sugary treats, making him the healthiest person I know.
meanings.sent5: The security system excludes intruders with its advanced technology.

meanings.sent1: The shopping list excludes items that are already in the pantry.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to exclude any irrelevant details from your presentation.
meanings.sent3: She playfully excludes her brother from the game to annoy him.
meanings.sent4: His speech excludes any mention of his ex-girlfriend, showing he has moved on.
meanings.sent5: The recipe excludes nuts for those with allergies.
